title: Sustaining the Work - Personal Practice and Social Permaculture in Timor-Leste Quiz

questions.question: What is the main focus of personal practice in permaculture?
choices: Applying permaculture principles to one's own life
Maximizing individual profits from permaculture projects
Ignoring the needs of the wider community
questions.answer: Applying permaculture principles to one's own life

questions.question: Social permaculture involves:
choices: Applying permaculture principles to social systems and structures
Designing agricultural landscapes for maximum yield
Breeding new plant varieties for specific climates
questions.answer: Applying permaculture principles to social systems and structures

questions.question: Personal practice and social permaculture are important for sustaining permaculture work in Timor-Leste.
